Protocols/SQLiteEscapable.html.name: SQLiteEscapable
Protocols/SQLiteEscapable.html.abstract: Protocol for escaping values for usage in queries

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: fetch(index:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Fetch value of column at given index

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: fetch(column:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Fetch value of column with given name

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: fetchAll()
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Fetch all rows as array of dictionaries

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: fetchAll(column:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Fetch all values of column at given index

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: fetchAll(index:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Fetch all values of column at given index

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: iterate()
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Returns sequence to iterate over all rows

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: iterate(index:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Returns sequence to iterate over all values of column at given index

Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.name: iterate(column:)
Classes/SQLiteResultSet.html#/s:11SwiftS.abstract: Returns sequence to iterate over all values of column with given name

Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.name: traceExecution
Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.abstract: If set to true, all queries are printed

Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.name: maxBusyRetries
Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.abstract: Number of trials before throwing TooBusy error

Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.name: lastInsertRowId
Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.abstract: Returns the rowid of the most recent successful [INSERT]

Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.name: query(_:arguments:)
Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.abstract: Prepares a query, binds arguments to it and execute it

Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.name: performTransaction(_:)
Classes/SQLite.html#/s:11SwiftSQLite0B0C.abstract: Executes the given block within a beginTransaction/commit block or calls rollback on errors
